entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning overnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
